title: Fried fish in oatmeal with tartare sauce
ingredients: 600g/1lb 5oz mixed fish fillets (such as herring, smoked haddock, plaice, etc), any pin bones removed, cut into strips
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 x 500g/1lb 2oz jar ready-made good quality mayonnaise
2 tbsp chopped pickled cornichons or gherkins
